section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments to temporary legislation by temporary legislation that will expire on February 4, 2022. To view the text of the temporary legislation that created this section, click this link: Temporary Version.*
section.heading: Administrative hearings deadlines.
section.text: Notwithstanding any provision of District law, but subject to applicable federal laws and regulations, the time period to request an administrative hearing for an appeal of a determination of benefits eligibility for unemployment compensation pursuant to § 51-111(b) shall be tolled.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-328, June 8, 2020, 67 DCR 7598).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-30, Mar. 17, 2021, 68 DCR 003101).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-96, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 006025).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 812 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 24, 2021, 68 DCR 004824).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-167, July 25, 2021, 68 DCR 009485).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-193, Nov. 1, 2021, 68 DCR 011599).

For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Office of Administrative Hearings Unemployment Appeals Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-50, Dec. 29, 2021, 68 DCR 011640).
